description:
In mango we inspire and join through our passion for style and culture.We are in 118 countries and our online presence extends to more than 80 countries.Our team is made up of people of 112 nationalities and 80% by women.

We are looking for a

Reporting & Controlling

How would your day to day in mango be?

As responsible for Reporting and Controlling Your great challenge will be the data analysis, definition of KPIÃ¢ÂÂs, monitoring of results and definition of processes that allow the increase in the productivity of the area of Ã¢ÂÂÃ¢ÂÂarchitecture and construction management.

The strategic definition through the analysis and transverse collaboration with other departments and stakeholders involved in the process of opening stores is essential for the evolution and performance of the area.For this, logical, analytical analysis is required, with great capacity to listen and analysis of useful data that allow decisions and improve processes (Customer Centric and Data Centric).

In your day to day ...

You will design and optimize information and data systems to use them in the analysis and achievement of objectives of the Architecture and Construction Management area
You will analyze the data collected and generation of useful data that allow to verify compliance with the objectives set at the area and equipment level, as well as the fulfillment of the budgets, timings and other parameters marked for the proper functioning of the stores.
You will analyze processes and data, in order to propose and find opportunities for improvement within the area and/or for the company.
Creation of Business Reports at the management level, as well as Business Cases of Projects.
KPIÃ¢ÂÂs communication to the area as a whole through verbal and written communication of high -level reports.
Analysis of improvements in processes, as well as optimization of collective and/or individual performance of the area.
Creation of Data Monitoring to identify changes in tendency and creation of alerts.
You will work as a team with all the main stakeholders to analyze and transform the commercial processes that improve sales data, KPIÃ¢ÂÂs and NPS through information analysis.
You will act as a collaborative link with the administration, finance and management departments to achieve the implementation of projects in time, cost and form.
Monitoring and leadership of the architecture and construction management team.Establish Dashboards, KPIÃ¢ÂÂs, incidents and coordination of needs with other departments.

What do we expect from you?

Minimum 3 -year experience such as Project Manager, Controller or Data/Business Analyst in the construction sector.
Training in Project Management, Finance, Data or Ade.
High knowledge in SQL and Excel (dynamic tables, programming, graphics and charts, ...), SAP, as well as data analysis tools (Knime, Weka ...)
High knowledge of visualization and reporting tools (Power Point, Power BIÃ¢Â?) As well as knowledge in simple viewing models and presentations summary.
High communication and leadership capacity.
High level of English.

What makes us special?

Immediate incorporation with an indefinite contract
Flexible schedule (entrance from 8h to 9h30 and departure from 5pm to 18h30), intensive day on Fridays (from 8h to 9h to 2pm / 15h) and majority of holiday vigils
Possibility of teleworking
Discount on all our lines in addition to a sample market to renew your closet twice a year
Dining and kitchen service at the Central facilities.The company subsidizes part of the daily menu, as well as cafeteria articles
Flexible remuneration with tax advantages: medical insurance, training, dining discount, nurseries etc.
Free company transport from Barcelona and VallÃÂ©s
Constant development opportunities with very varied challenges that generate learning in the workplace and specific courses based on your needs
Workshops, Meetupps, Communities of Practices, Team Buildings and Company Meetings about digital transformation, fashion and activities of our teams
Own medical service, physiotherapy service once a week, fitness room and changing rooms in our central offices
You will be part of a leading company in the fashion sector, dynamic, in full innovation, with great awareness and performing actions towards sustainability with a close, inspiring and ambitious work environment

You Got It?

We like you!

description:
About The Job

The Credit Transaction Management (CTM) Transversal Monitoring Analyst is responsible for providing essential support on the analysis, registration and follow-up of the Credit Mitigations Risks associated to the Structured Credits, within the Bank systems and to contribute to Finance and Risk Reporting and Control. The Analyst is responsible for ensuring that all processes related to the collection, input, analysis and update of security package data, covenant data, asset management data and ESG data are carried with efficiency and accuracy and are compliant with the Regulatory requirements assuring the permanent control and monitoring of the Credit Risk.

Your Main Activities Are

Work collaboratively with Front Office, Credit Analysts, Deal Implementation Team to take in charge the Covenants follow-up and monitoring, Security Package and Asset Management after closing of the deal
Identify within all Legal Documentation, with the assistance of Front Office/Credit Analysts, Legal or other relevant stakeholders, the covenants to be monitored and the securities eligible for registration (according to current regulations and procedures) and accurately map them with the Bank Nomenclatures, with the assistance
Input covenant data in the IT Tool Covenant Manager (CM), Security Package data in Received Guarantee Module (RGM) and Asset & ESG Data in Asset Module
Collect the exhaustive Legal documentation for a deal (Financing documents, Security Package documents, Legal opinions)
Collect the necessary information linked to Covenants (compliance certificates, Financial Statements), Security Package (expiring/ expired, validity, upcoming & overdue valuation), Asset Management (insurances, valuations) and ESG and update them periodically
Monitor credit / counterparty risks with reporting dedicated to Business & Risk (control monitoring of breach and overdue covenants and report them appropriately), monitor security package, monitor asset management & ESG regulatory requirements (such as Loan Tape)

Profile And Skills To Success

Bachelor Degree in Business Management / Economics / Finance and Accounting
Advanced level of English, both written and oral
Knowledge in MS Office Pack
Ability to collaborate / Teamwork
Organisational Skills
Critical Thinking
Attention to detail / rigor
Analytical ability

Why joining BNP Paribas?

Leading banking institution

BNP Paribas is a leader in the Eurozone, and a prominent international banking institution with strong roots in Europe's banking history. It has a presence in 65 countries, with around 190 000 Employees Ã¢Â?including more than 145 000 in Europe.

Our presence in Portugal

Since 1985, BNP Paribas was one of the first foreign banks to operate in the country. Today, the Group has around 7.100 employees across several entities operating directly in the territory, offering a wide range of integrated financial solutions to support its clients and their businesses.

International reach

Thanks to its international presence and regular and close collaboration among its different entities, BNP Paribas has the resources to support all clients with financing, investment, savings and protection solutions that help make their projects a success. BNP Paribas holds key positions in its three core operating divisions:

Retail Banking, a division that brings together all of the GroupÃ¢ÂÂs retail activities and specialised business lines
Investment & Protection Services that include specialised businesses offering a wide range of savings, investment and protection services.
Corporate & Institutional Banking division that offers tailored financial solutions for corporate and institutional client.
Diversity and Inclusion commitment

BNP Paribas is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

Commitment towards work/life balance

At BNP Paribas we care about our employees wellbeing and promote a culture of good integration between work and rest. We believe our employees have rich personal lives outside of work, being fundamental to be disconnected from work to recharge both physically and mentally. Only through this balance we may all be at our best while working.

Remote Working Conditions

At BNP Paribas, we embrace a Smart Working framework based on trust, autonomy and collaboration. Within this framework, eligible employees can benefit from flexible remote working modalities adapted to our hybrid working environment. To guarantee a comfortable and efficient working set-up, eligible employees are provided with both the office and home equipment, are entitled to an equipment allowance and can benefit from exclusive partnerships to purchase additional equipment at reduced prices.

To find out more on why you should join BNP Paribas visit https://bnpp.lk/why-BNP-Paribas-Portugal

Please note that only applications submitted in English will be considered.
In case you are selected for this role, further documentation will be requested to support your hiring process.

description:
Everything we do, starts with you.Together with you, we build the most human-centric fintech. To enable everyoneÃ¢ÂÂs future financial growth.

We are looking for an ambitious

Junior Business Analyst (m/f/d)

(unlimited, full-time) Join our team at our location in Verl, Baden-Baden, Mainz, Berlin, Oslo or Stockholm Ã¢Â?flexible working conditions available

Description of position:

Us in Riverty are currently on the lookout for a Business Analyst to BI Analysis team. Our team is responsible for development and improvement of our BI self-service solutions, as well as requirement gathering from our internal stakeholders and communication with data engineers. As a Business Analyst, you will work closely with our colleagues in Finance and Data Engineering, and learn a lot about our data sources and processes.

As a Business Analyst, you will:

Act as an interface between internal stakeholders and data / BI engineers
Support in building, maintaining and improving Power BI apps and dashboards
Work on quality assurance and testing of new features, bug fixes and data model improvements
Support in building composite models and new measures into existing models

Good knowledge of SQL
Experience with Power BI, Tableau or similar reporting tools is a plus
Excellent knowledge of English, second language (e.g. Norwegian or German is a plus)

We are looking for these traits:

Analytical, with creative, structured and logical approach
Detail oriented and able to work both independently and in a team
Excellent communication skills
Comfortable working in a constantly changing environment

Thrive at Riverty with great benefits:

Enjoy an open, trusting culture in agile teams and access opportunities within the Bertelsmann Group.
Prioritize your health with supported sports and leisure activities.
Grow together through Riverty Academy trainings and personalized development.
Feel valued with numerous employee discounts.
Our flexible working arrangements empower you to blend on-site collaboration with remote work, tailoring your professional experience to suit your lifestyle.

This list doesn't assure any certain benefits or actions. They might depend on the country or contract details and can change anytime without prior notice. We are happy to discuss these benefits further during an interview.

We are Riverty. And we believe everyone should be in control of their financials. We ask you to join in. Because together with you, we build the most human-centric fintech. We build on experience of more than 50 years. More than 5,000 people in 13 countries drive our company and contribution to society. And we have their backs. Our world is growing. And weÃ¢ÂÂre here. Together, weÃ¢ÂÂre finding smarter, simpler, seamlessly connected ways to manage money. By leveraging data and financial technology, our holistic solutions provide flexible payments, smarter accounting, and fair debt collection, all aimed at fostering everyone's financial growth.

And. Everything we do, starts with you. Join us and letÃ¢ÂÂs build a more sustainable financial future, together.

With offices across five continents and licences in more than 20 countries, we operate some of the most well-known and iconic brands in the industry with more than 250 years of combined history Ã¢Â?names such as Ladbrokes, partypoker, bwin and Coral.

This role will support the Digital Finance Manager and is meant to work with several internal customers, both in the Digital division and in BI, at all levels of the organization

We may sit on the FTSE100, but for millions of customers worldwide, weÃ¢ÂÂre the brands they hold in their hands Ã¢Â?and heart. As the home of household names like Ladbrokes, Foxy and PartyPoker, to name just a few, we elevate lives with moments of excitement. And right now weÃ¢ÂÂre elevating ourselves above the competition. WeÃ¢ÂÂre leading the industry in bold new directions - and itÃ¢ÂÂs our diverse and talented team who are making this possible. DEI and Wellbeing @ Entain

Our vision is to be the world leader in betting, gaming and interactive entertainment, and we know that the most successful businesses are the most sustainable ones. Diversity and inclusion is key to sustainability and success and our goal is to attract, engage and retain the best talent globally, bringing the best thinking to our business from inside and outside of our sector. We want our employees to feel healthy and supported at home and at work. ThatÃ¢ÂÂs why we have our Well-me programme, which provides information, tools and training to help our people look after their mental and physical wellbeing in ways that matter to them.

Life @ Entain

WeÃ¢ÂÂre a team who love to play, and win, together. We love building bonds between our people, and we love to build your career up too. Join us, and we wonÃ¢ÂÂt just be your employer, weÃ¢ÂÂll be your biggest cheerleader. description:
Job Description

This is Allego

Allego is the leading company for fast and ultra-fast charging solutions to companies and consumers throughout Europe. We deliver charging facilities ranging from regular home charging to state-of-the-art high power charging that can be used by all electric cars and every EV driver, providing a seamless charging experience. Our goal is to contribute to zero emission mobility and allow EV drivers to charge at the right place with the right speed. The EV market is emerging and changing rapidly. With our proven track record and long experience, we keep driving forward with confidence.

A Bit More About The Job

We are looking for a new team member to join our Network Planning team, which is located in Berlin (DE). The Network Planning team is responsible for determining the right location for the right type of charger to support investment decisions for infrastructure expansion and to reach our goal of clean mobility. In other words: as a Data Analyst you spot locations where people with EVs are, or potentially would like to charge, based on lots of data. You do this through the evaluation of potential charging locations based on spatial, demographical and strategic factors and convert this into a business case. With your analyses you play a pivot role in the investment decisions for expansion of our network.

Of course you wonÃ¢ÂÂt do this alone. You will be a part of a dynamic international team. They will help you to get up to speed within Allego, but hopefully you can teach them a thing or two yourself, because a fresh pair of eyes always sees new things. The Network Planning team collaborates closely with related departments within Allego like Sales, Finance and Product Development. So you will operate in an international environment with colleagues from all over Europe.

Since Allego is one of the main players in this new and growing industry, you will be able to shape the future of transport and build the charging infrastructure of the future!

Requirements

This is you

With your excellent analytical skills, you recognize patters in big loads of data, so you can pinpoint ideal locations for EV chargers. You enjoy working with numbers and are always looking for ways to use data to improve results. Your flexibility, optimism and Ã¢ÂÂcan-doÃ¢Â?attitude fits our fast-paced environment. You are eager to learn, highly self-motivated, and excited to work in the highly innovative and international sector of sustainable mobility!

As our ideal candidate:

You have at least 2 years experience in an analytics and/or e-mobility related position.
You combine your experience in data analysis with at least basic experience in geodata processing and/or business case modeling.
Excel has no secrets for you. If you have knowledge of Power BI or GIS (QGIS), we will be very happy.
You have affinity towards the EV and charging industry.
You are able to independently manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Your excellent communication skills enable you to connect and collaborate with multiple internal stakeholders.
You are fluent in English, and as we will expand our network to many European countries, you are not afraid of fellow-Europeans.
You are located near Berlin AND you are eligible to work in a European country.

This is our offer

Still with us and interested and curious what we offer? First and foremost, we give you: salary! Rent needs to be paid after all. Pension? Also covered. But more interestingly is what we cannot express in money: we offer you a challenging job with responsibilities and real influence, in a fast-paced, goal-oriented environment. At Allego you choose your own challenges, we will make education and training available to keep driving forward.

Having read all of this and still thinking that this is a great opportunity (then you are probably right), just apply via the link. Hopefully we meet soon.

description:
Who are we? Amaris Consultingis an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade Ã¢Â?this is made possible by an international team of 7,500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. WeÃ¢ÂÂre focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

Here's What Our Recruitment Process Looks Like

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible.

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews(the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you! Job description

description:
ComparaJÃÂ¡.pt

ComparaJÃÂ¡.pt is a free and independent online comparison platform for financial services and products, with a clear mission: to help people saving time and money, in a quick and simple comparison tool.

Our goal is for Portuguese consumers to make informed and conscious financial decisions. For this, we provide a free, impartial, thorough and independent platform, where people can compare the various financial providers in the Portuguese market for home loans, personal loans, credit cards, telecommunication and energy providers, life insurance and saving accounts.

We are the #1 personal finance platform in Portugal for the users, our partners and media channels. We are part of Samlino Group, a European Investment Company that helps Europeans save time and money by making better choices about insurance, home services and banking products. In Europe, our sister companies are: Samlino.dk (Denmark), VertaaEnsin.fi (Finland), TopCompare.be & Tariefchecker.be (Belgium), and Pricefox.gr (Greece).

What You'll Do

Reporting to the Financial Controller, you will support:

Revenue closing;
Confirmation of unbilled revenue with partners: reconciliation of full data with partner data;
Confirmation of membership costs;
Issuance and registration of invoices;
Maintaining the register of partner contracts.

What We Expect From You

You possess an unparalleled work ethic with a high sense of urgency. You have a relentless drive and desire to be the very best at what you do. You take ownership of everything you do, are proactive and follow through on commitments. Moreover, you're humble and you share our passion for building and executing new businesses. Furthermore, we expect that you:

Have acquired a bachelor degree in Accountability, Management, Economics, Finance or another related field. Financial knowledge is a plus.
You are a fresh graduate looking for a first experience in a fast-paced working environment.
You are knowledgeable in MS Office.
You have a strong sense of ownership and initiative and a genuine interest in learning and act on the desire.
You have a strong affinity for critical thinking, analytical, hands-on execution, problem-solving, and result-orientation.
Ideally you are available to start in May 2023 and have an EU work permit.

What We Offer

A workplace with great talents and leaders that will inspire and challenge you daily.
Competitive compensation and benefits.
Assume responsibility and decision-making authority from your first day.
Work on exciting and challenging projects and create an impact with new, innovative ideas.
Grow personally and professionally from working both independently and as part of an international group.
Work with and learn from experts and mentors in diverse fields.
Create strong and meaningful connections with your team members at exciting company events.
Be part of one of the most promising Portuguese fintech startups, with one goal in mind: help the Portuguese people saving money.

description:
Functieomschrijving
Sta jij aan het begin van je loopbaan, ambieer jij een carriÃÂ¨re in de data wereld en wil je elke dag een beetje beter worden in je vak? Tijdens het traineeship van KVL word je klaargestoomd door ervaren data-experts, om je vervolgens te specialiseren als data engineer, data-analist of data steward.

Dit is wat je van het Data Heroes traineeship kunt verwachten:

Je start samen met mede-trainees met een basistraining in data & analytics;
Vervolgens kies je een specialisme en volg je vakgerelateerde- en persoonlijke ontwikkelingstrainingen;
Ondertussen breng je alle kennis in de praktijk bij LeasePlan Digital en bouw je mee aan het worden van de grootse leasemaatschappij ter wereld.

Oh ja, gedurende je hele traineeship word je begeleid door een ervaren mentor waar je continu terecht kunt. Klinkt gaaf, toch?

Door jou maken we impact
Ben jij iemand die altijd het maximale uit zichzelf haalt? Vind je het belangrijk om een positieve impact te maken? LeasePlan Digital kan jouw data en digitale ambities goed gebruiken! LeasePlan Digital is continu bezig met het verbeteren van de efficiÃÂ«ntie en productiviteit in de wereldwijde auto lease-industrie. Met de digitale diensten van LeasePlan Digital zorgen voor betrouwbaar en efficiÃÂ«nt beheer van lease-auto's. Wil jij helpen de automotive lease-sector te transformeren? Lees dan snel verder!

Met de kennis en vaardigheden die je hebt opgedaan, kun je echt een verschil maken. Als er een wederzijdse klik is, kun je na je inwerkperiode je carriÃÂ¨re tot grote hoogtes laten stijgen bij LeasePlan Digital. We hebben prachtige carriÃÂ¨repaden uitgestippeld, waardoor je op jouw eigen tempo kunt doorgroeien van junior naar senior! Alles wat je leert, kun je bij LeasePlan Digital direct in de praktijk toepassen. LeasePlan Digital is gevestigd in een levendig pand aan de Zuidas in Amsterdam.

Vindt jouw rol is bij LeasePlan Digital
Als Data & Analytics Specialist bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een multidisciplinair team van professionals om data te verzamelen, te analyseren en te presenteren. Je bouwt pipelines, creÃÂ«ert informatieve dashboards en optimaliseert het proces van dataverkrijging. Je bijdrage zal cruciaal zijn om van een versnipperd datamodel naar een centraal datamodel te gaan, met als voornaamste doel om de global data hub te bouwen en relevante data te delen met alle stakeholders.

Je werkt aan uiteenlopende projecten, zoals het leveren van dashboards voor operationele of financiÃÂ«le teams, het aanleveren van data aan leveranciers en het bouwen van pipelines voor datawarehouses. Als Data Hero bij LeasePlan Digital heb je de kans om deel uit te maken van een spannende reis, een pad te banen in de digitale transformatie van de leasemarkt, en een echte impact te maken op de manier waarop mensen wereldwijd gebruik maken van mobiliteit.

LeasePlan Digital zoekt versterking van:

Data Engineers
Data Modelleurs
Data Stewards

De kansen en doorgroeimogelijkheden bij LeasePlan Digital
LeasePlan Digital biedt een werkomgeving waarin je de ruimte krijgt om te leren en te groeien. Met ongeveer vijftien leads en een groeiend team van meer dan 150 professionals, zijn er volop mogelijkheden om zijwaarts of omhoog te bewegen binnen de organisatie. LeasePlan Digital heeft een functiehuis ontwikkeld waarin je je eigen doorgroeipaden kunt doorlopen.

Bij LeasePlan Digital werk je in een team waarin mensen graag een extra stapje zetten en waar ruimte is voor het delen van kennis en eigen inbreng. De data teams van LeasePlan Digital hebben een hechte teamcultuur en staan altijd klaar om elkaar te helpen. LeasePlan Digital zit in een spannende fase, we zijn bezig om de grootste leasemaatschappij ter wereld te worden. LeasePlan Digital in transitie naar een nieuwe architectuur en met nieuwe technieken. Jij krijgt de kans om hieraan bij te dragen.

Pas jij in het plaatje?
Voordat we inzoomen op de arbeidsvoorwaarden schetsen we onderstaand naar wat voor startende professionals we zoeken:

Een afgeronde HBO/WO-opleiding;
Uitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift;
Analytisch en conceptueel denkvermogen en overtuigingskracht;
Jij bent een echte teamplayer en niet bang om vragen te stellen.

Communicatieve vaardigheden zijn bij LeasePlan Digital net zo belangrijk als technische vaardigheden. In de beginfase van je loopbaan bij LeasePlan Digital zul je met je soft skills je hardskills verbeteren. Je moet bereid zijn om vragen te stellen, op mensen af te stappen en proactief informatie te zoeken.

LeasePlan Digital waardeert zelfstarters en mensen die hun ambities en ideeÃÂ«n durven te uiten. We zoeken mensen die goed kunnen samenwerken, maar ook in staat zijn om zelfstandig te werken en verantwoordelijkheid te nemen. Idealiter heb je ook affiniteit met data-analyse in je vrije tijd of hobby, bijvoorbeeld door je bezig te houden met home automation of het meten van je eigen prestaties.

What's in it for me?
Bij KVL ademen we data. We begrijpen niet alleen data maar juist ook de menselijke kant van data. Daarom kun je zowel goede primaire als secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden van ons verwachten:

Een bruto salaris tussen de Ã¢Â?.000,- en Ã¢Â?.000, (afhankelijk van het aantal jaren werkervaring);
Kennisdeling, veel fun-activiteiten en borrels met gelijkgestemden;
Veel professionele aandacht voor je persoonlijke ontwikkeling, bijvoorbeeld aan de hand van jouw persoonlijk ondernemersplan;
We houden je fit met een bedrijfsfitnessregeling;
26 vakantiedagen (op basis van fulltime dienstverband);
We houden je mobiel met een NS Business card;
Je krijgt natuurlijk een laptop en een telefoonvergoeding;
Een top pensioenregeling.

KVL: Bringing Analytics To The People
KVL helpt organisaties om datagedreven te worden en meer waarde te halen uit data. Wij bieden daarvoor een complete dienstverlening aan vanuit vier business lines: Advies & Regie, Strategic Staffing, Digital Data Solutions en Analytics Academy.

Hoe werken bij KVL eruit ziet
Vraag het een van onze medewerkers en ze vertellen je waarschijnlijk dat werken bij KVL voelt alsof je deel uitmaakt van een familie. Dat komt omdat we onze nieuwe collegaÃ¢ÂÂs in de eerste plaats selecteren op hun persoonlijkheid. Dan pas op hun kennis en ervaring. We vinden het namelijk leuk om met elkaar samen te werken, kennis te delen, elkaar te inspireren of een borrel te drinken. Dat doen we dan ook regelmatig op ons hoofdkantoor in de oude Van Nelle Fabriek in Rotterdam.

We zijn een platte organisatie die erg gericht is op zelfsturing, eigen initiatief, continue verbetering en op het realiseren van meetbare en zichtbare resultaten bij onze klanten en binnen onze eigen organisatie. Zin, wil, energie en drive om zelf te groeien en om actief mee te bouwen aan Ã¢ÂÂthe next levelÃ¢Â? Dan zijn wij misschien wel het juiste bedrijf voor jou.

Morgen een kop koffie?
Wil jij jouw carriÃÂ¨re een impuls geven de komende jaren door Ã¢ÂÂlearning by earningÃ¢Â?centraal te stellen? Solliciteer dan direct!

Heb je nog inhoudelijke vragen over deze functie? Neem gerust contact met ons via recruitment@kvl.nl. Mariam neemt daarna snel contact met je op.

Bij KVL komen we altijd direct tot actie. De sollicitatieprocedure is helder en snel.

Na jouw sollicitatie nemen we bij interesse snel contact met je op. Dan organiseren we een korte telefonische kennismaking met Mariam.
Wanneer er van beide kanten een klik is, nodigen we je graag uit om nader kennis te maken en dan krijg je eventueel een online assessment.
Er is natuurlijk ruimte om kennis te maken met collegaÃ¢ÂÂs uit het team zodat je even mee kan kijken en vragen kunt stellen!
Nog steeds enthousiasme aan beide kanten? Dan sluiten we de sollicitatieprocedure af met een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek.

description:
Who we are looking for

Knowledge and experience with SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL etc.);
1+ years of experience with programming languages such as Python and R;
Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, d3.js, or equivalent would be considered as an advantage;
Knowledge of the Jupyter IDE would be considered as an advantage;
Major fields of study in statistics, econometrics, data analytics or other relevant areas;
Strong analytical and communication skills;
Fluency in English - both verbal and written

Your future role

The Data Scientist will join a regional team responsible for developing advanced analytics products; applying data visualization and statistical programming tools to enterprise data to advance and enable key mission outcomes. You can expect projects in which we use data analytics to advise our customers on important strategic, financial and operational issues.
Carry out economically sound simulations and impact analyzes and forecasts the effects of changed corporate and corporate structures. Recognize the interrelationships in big data, illustrate them with suitable visualizations and make the flood of data usable for the successful implementation of complex corporate transactions. Link customer data in a suitable way to form complex data models and use sophisticated analysis methods - such as regression, clustering or and text analytics.
Work with modern analysis tools and use our powerful analytics infrastructure. Present and represent your work results to the customer. Bring your knowledge and skills to both customer projects and projects for the development of product innovations.

What we offer

Competitive salary and social benefits; New projects where you can develop your skills;
Real impact on the business solutions;
Work in one of the worldÃ¢ÂÂs largest consulting firms
Work for well-known brands
Additional Wellness days (4)
Healthcare plan
Health insurance (mixed package)
Working across multiple geographies and clients
Travel Insurance

Selection process

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. All applications will be considered under the terms and conditions of confidentiality in accordance with the regulations of personal data protection.

About Deloitte

Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences.What you only must do is to take the first step Ã¢Â?press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.

About The Team

Do you want to build your brand by working for a leading consulting firm that drives eminence in the marketplace? Are you interested in leveraging your analytical skills and strategic ideas to improve mission execution? If so, Deloitte could be the place for you! Our team brings deep industry expertise, rigorous analytical capabilities and a pragmatic mindset to help solve our clientÃ¢ÂÂs most complex business problems. Learn, develop, and grow in your career path!

Var Groupon a turnover of Ã¢Â?572 million to 30 April 2022, over 3,400 collaborators and an extensive presence in Italy and in 10 countries abroad (France, Germany, Spain, Romania, Austria, Switzerland, China, Mexico, USA and Tunisia), is one of the main leaders in the sector of digital services and solutions.

The Var Group offers and solutions are renewed daily thanks to the continuous research and close collaboration with start -ups and university polo poles, allowing him to be at the side of the major Italian districts such as manufacturing, food & beverage, pharmis, automotive, mechanical, fashion & luxury,Furniture, Gdo & Retail.

By choosing Var Group, you will become part of Ungreat Place to Work.In 2022 we in fact obtained certification, which rewards our reality as a company in which you are fine and work well.

Position:

For its own competence center Var Prime, entirely dedicated to the development of digital transformation projects based on Microsoft technology, we are looking for a Power BI developer figure

As part of the projects on the Microsoft BC platform you will have the opportunity to:

Analyze, draw and develop reporting and dashboard with Microsoft Power BI as well as dealing with pre-existing dashboard re-enigning
Have ability to manage deploy autonomy of the application components
Analyze and interpret the requirements to provide personalized solutions
Maintenance of knowledge on the trends in the sector and on the new features of Power BI
Collaboration with the software development team to ensure the integration of data between different sources and the quality of the data
If you are at least 5-6 years of experimental role and want to grow and make a change to your career, then we are looking for you!

Experience in managing databases, relational and non -relational, as well as in the modeling of complex data through Power BI
Knowledge of Microsoft SQL, SSIS, SSAS, SSR, Power BI, as well as concepts and techniques of Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence techniques and tools
Drawing and implementation capacity of reports and dashboard via Power BI, as well as knowledge of the architecture and the Licensing of Power BI
Knowledge Dax and SQL
Azure platform knowledge (Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL Data Base, Azure Data Lake) and Cloud additions
Soft Skills:

Proactivity and aptitude for problem solving
Leadership skills
Autonomy in managing their activities in the context of prefixed times and methods
The profile complete:

SQL Server knowledge and analysis tools Analysis Services
Good knowledge of the English language
More information:

Var Group, rather than a workplace, is an environment open to innovation, research and sharing excellent experiences.A reality in which it is possible to grow and cover challenging roles, always in close relationship with the world leaders in the sector.

Our offices are located in: Milan, Rome, Verona, Caserta, Genoa and Empoli and have been renewed to improve the work experience on site.We apply very flexible smart working policies.

What we offer

Work flexibility
Dynamic and growing -growing work environment
Continuous training
Personalized career path

Canteen or tickets

Var Group S.p.A.It guarantees a fair, meritocratic and transparent approach in order to create an organization that plays the person in the center, enhancing the different backgrounds, experiences and skills of each individual.We aim to attract, select and hold the best talents, implementing objectives and impartial selection processes and offering professional development plans aimed at enhancing skills and personal skills.

description:
Data Analyst & Operations Manager

We're looking for a motivated data driven person who will help us shape our team, drive the company to the next level, and have the most direct influence on our success. This position is available in Oeiras - Lisbon Hybrid mode (On-site and Remote).

You solve problems by connecting your holistic business knowledge, marketing understanding and deep dive analytical abilities
You are our truffle hunter, who quickly finds smart and pragmatic ways through complex datasets and recognises patterns in business KPIs and marketing channels
You autonomously realize projects in cooperation with other colleagues as well as with marketing channels which serve the management as a strategic decision-making basis for growth and excellence
You filter growth relevant information from our BI/tracking systems and convert complexity into simplicity
You find strategies to automate marketing campaigns, improve targeting and drive marketing efficiency
You monitor business relevant KPIs on a regular basis and find new ways for automated reporting systems
You monitor business supply chain on a regular basis to ensure our stock is up to our potential sales

Degree in Engineering, TI, Business Informatics, Economics, Statistics, Data Science or similar
Strong analytical skills: able to break down problems, test hypotheses, track the impact of solutions on the respective problems.
Great experience with tools such as Excel and PowerBI or similar
Know-how in Google Analytics is nice to have
Know-how in Facebook Ads is nice to have
Know-how in segmentation is nice to have
Fluent in English and Portuguese; every other European language is a plus

You have an impact. With innovation and smart technology, we create comfy sustainable shoes and digital assets for the future generations. We want your ideas and give you autonomy to make them reality.
At Undo For Tomorrow we are flexible. Organize your own schedule, and balance work between the office and home as itÃ¢ÂÂs best for you. We give you trust-based hours and a flexible smart working policy.
Teamwork makes the dream work. Our team has people from 3 different continents. We work in a multicultural environment where we can challenge and support each other.
WeÃ¢ÂÂre building for the long term, and that means protecting our planet. We constantly test new green technologies and new opportunities, both physical and digital.

We are a Brazilian / European footwear startup with headquarters in Lisbon preparing to sell globally. We started not so long ago (2021) and we are growing fast with many challenges and new market opportunities to unlock.
We believe that innovation and technology allied to sustainability is key to success in one of the most competitive markets on the planet. Our goal is to bring comfort and well being to our growing community.
Our journey has just begun. Are you ready to join us and help shape the future?

Undofortomorrow is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender (including pregnancy and gender identity), national, social or ethnic origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, age, veteran status, or other legally protected characteristics. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, competence and merit.

and facilitate future client growth

Your team

You'll be working in the Knowledge Services team in Krakow. Sitting at the intersection of business and technology teams, Knowledge Services provides data and support to our teams around the globe. The team is a part of the Asset Management COO and has a mandate to govern and commercialize data through innovative technology and services.

description:
Eneris Applus+is a global firm of consulting and engineering, leader in the renewable energy sector and storage solutions.We have a presence in more than 65 countries, and participation in different associations of the sector.

Our experience and "know-how" guarantees solutions adapted to the challenges and problems of our clients.We pursue excellence ensuring the quality and continuous improvement of our activities and processes, reaching the highest quality standards.

We are an agile and transparent company, which ensures neutrality and firmly bets on customer advice.

Due to the exponential growth in the US market that Enertis has experienced during these years, a large amount of knowledge has been generated both in terms of the market and the different technologies and competitors.

As an organization that learns and cares about the learning of its employees, we constantly seek the way to keep the knowledge of the people who are part of our team, to continue being competitive and leaders in our sector.

That is why we are currently looking for an analyst, which will have the main objective of making an inventory of all existing knowledge in the organization, as well as expanding them with external sources.

The analyst would be integrated into the Data Science & Consulting team, and its prncipal headquarters would be our Madrid offices, although it would be directly tutoring by its director in the US.Due to its role, it will be related to the rest of the departments of the company both at the local level and in the rest of the international subsidiaries.Among others, their functions would include:

Deepen your knowledge in the company and our area for which you will have full access to all documents generated internally in Energis.
Organize such knowledge and transform it into training content for employees (in different formats) and manuals for current workers and new additions.
Start initiatives that, based on computer support, make this information an easily accessible inventory for anyone in the organization.
Actively participate in studies carried out by the Department
Identify, parameterize and interpret the results of these studies.

What are we looking for?

University degree
Advanced Office Package Level
Previous experience will be assessed by handling databases.

What do we offer?

Incorporation to a consolidated team.
Internal career plan.
Company in constant growth.
Hybrid modality (e-work and face-to-face)
Time and conciliation flexibility.

description:
At IONOS, the leading European provider of cloud infrastructure, cloud services and hosting services, you will work together with a wide range of teams. We are characterized by open structures, a friendly working culture and flat hierarchies with a strong team spirit. We firmly believe that work and fun are compatible, and offer you the right environment for this. Our constant growth means that we are always looking for new colleagues. Become part of IONOS and grow with us.

Your Tasks:

You have a degree in Business Information Systems or a comparable course of study as well as several years of experience in the field of Business Intelligence and are looking for an exciting challenge in a dynamic, internationally operating company. In addition, you have:

You will enable data-based enterprise management by preparing and merging raw data and making it available using modern BI technologies.
You will be the contact person for existing reports their data quality, and you will be available to our internal customers in an advisory capacity.
You will create suitable evaluations for complex inquiries.
You will develop ideas to continuously optimize data storage, processing, and provision.

We Appreciate:

You have a degree in Business Information Systems or a comparable course of study as well as several years of experience in the field of Business Intelligence and are looking for an exciting challenge in a dynamic, internationally operating company. In addition, you have:

Confident handling of SQL, knowledge of the MS SQL Server stack and SQL Server Analysis Services is advantageous.
Initial experience in report development with common tools (ideally Microsoft SSRS and Power BI).
Analytical skills and enjoy communicating at all levels of the organization.
A team-oriented and structured approach to work.
A high degree of initiative, a quick grasp and enthusiasm for exciting tasks.
Application-safe MS Office skills as well as a good command of English.

About IONOS

IONOS is the leading European digitalization partner for small and medium-sized businesses (SMB). The company serves around six million customers and operates across 18 markets in Europe and North America, with its services being accessible worldwide. With its Web Presence & Productivity portfolio, IONOS acts as a 'one-stop shop' for all digitalization needs: from domains and web hosting to classic website builders and do-it-yourself solutions, from e-commerce to online marketing tools. In addition, the company offers Cloud Solutions to enterprises who are looking to move to the cloud as their businesses evolve.

We value diversity and welcome all applications - regardless of, for example, gender, nationality, ethnic or social origin, religion, disability, age as well as sexual orientation and identity, physical characteristics, marital status or any other irrelevant factor subject to applicable law.

description:
About TPV Technology

TPV Technology is an internationally-renowned PC monitor, TV and Digital Signage Displays manufacturer. TPV serves as an original design manufacturer for some of the best-known TV , PC and Digital Signage Displays brands in the industry and distributes its products worldwide under its own brands AOC and Envision. In addition, the company designs, produces and sells Philips-branded monitors, TV's and AVA products, Digital Signage Displays and mobile phones through a license agreement with Philips via its subsidiaries TP Vision and MMD. As an example, the company brings high-quality TV sets to the market: smart and easy to use with sophisticated styling. TPV believes in creating products that touch the human senses and are within reach of all consumers in the markets they operate in. As a leader in the hotel industry, their hospitality TV division serves most the world's major international and national hotel groups, as well as individual hotels, hospitals, cruises and other professional facilities.

About TP Vision

TP Vision is a consumer electronics key player in the world of audio visual digital entertainment. TP Vision concentrates on developing, manufacturing and marketing Philips branded TV sets (Europe, Russia, Middle East, South America, India and selected countries in Asia-Pacific) and audio products (all around the Globe). We do this by combining the innovative Philips brand heritage with our design expertise, operational excellence, flexibility and speed of TPV Technology. With these combined strengths, we bring high-quality TV sets to the market: smart and easy to use with sophisticated styling. We believe in creating products that offer a superior audio and visual experience for consumers. With Philips TVs, TP Vision is a global leader in the hospitality market. TP Vision is the exclusive brand licensee of Philips TVs for the above listed countries and, on the global stage for the Philips audio products.TP Vision employs close to 2,000 people in several locations around the globe and is 100% owned by TPV, one of the worldÃ¢ÂÂs leading monitor and LCD TV manufacturers, selling and marketing Philips branded TVs in China. TPV has been able to drive its growth over the years by leveraging its economies of scale and core competencies in R&D, manufacturing, logistic efficiency and quality.

Scope

You will be responsible for the preparation and the implementation of the Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)-Directive. The first year will be focused on the execution of a double materiality assessment, gap assessment of the CSR-Directive criteria and an EU Taxonomy assessment. After these assessments you will define the roadmap and coordinate with the data owners how to comply with the CSR-Directive.

What Do We Offer You

A new, fulltime position and flexible working (from our refurbished European HQ office in Amsterdam, opposite from Amstel station, and from home)
An entrepreneurial, dynamic, challenging, and fast-moving international working environment, working with great brands
Fast decision-making environment / flat organisation
Competitive remunerationEducation And Related Experience

MasterÃ¢ÂÂs Degree in a relevant field
5-10 years proven experience in Sustainability or Compliance
Knowledge of Integrated & sustainability reporting standards and EcoVadis methodology
Fluent in English
Excellent project management skills
Proven track record in independent project management (including budgets, timelines, deliverables and reporting)
Strong analytics skills and communication skills
Strong experience in internal and external stakeholder management
Ambition to grow sustainability skills and the drive to successfully manage multiple projects running at the same time
Critical thinker with strong problem-solving skills
Strong interpersonal and communication skills, stakeholder management skills within and outside the company, and within multicultural diverse organizations
Ambitious, pro-active, high drive for getting-things-done
Able to work independently in dynamic fast changing business environmentMore Info

If you enjoy working with knowledgeable, success-oriented people, for a company that both challenges and respects its professionals, and you've got what it takes to be a great Sustainability Reporting Specialist, then apply today. Please contact Monique Manger (Corporate Recruiter) at info@careersattpvision.com (please include your CV and a short motivation).

Acquisition as a result of this vacancy posting is not appreciated.

description:
About The Job

Initiated by CPL Portugal Hub Ã¢Â?OPTI to provide performance measure and more generally end to end reporting on the main compliance processes that are now well recognized as high value added services for compliance and the business
The aim is to create business-facing dashboards and high impact data visualizations and analyses with complex data structures which will support the Compliance Portugal Hub Internal or External clients achieve their objectives in terms of revenue generation, efficiency creation, production levels and risk management
In this frame, the Head Portugal Hub would like to recruit a Data Analyst
Your Main Activities Are

Reporting maintenance and data refresh / produce based on the established frequency the relevant dashboards
Collaborate with internal/external clients to best understand their operational and strategic needs
Create descriptive, predictive and quantitative analyses addressing key business priorities and supporting the stakeholders' decision making
Support and monitor the run of these actvities of data analysis, reporting and data mining
Contribute to disseminate a culture of data driven solutions within BNP Paribas
Provide visibility on performance and activities of BNP Paribas to stakeholders
Develop knowledge on both systems used for reporting production in order to become quickly autonomous
Be able to provide explanation on the calculus methods and formulas for the main indicators
Profile And Skills To Success

Bachelor Degree in Business / IT / Data Science & Analytics
Up to 2 years of relevant experience in Reporting and Data Modeling / Mining
Advanced level of English, both written and oral
Knowledge in Data Viz, Blending , Analytics: Power Bi, Tableau softwares
Proactivity
Ability to collaborate / Teamwork
Creativity & Innovation / Problem solving
Ability to understand, explain and support change
Ability to develop and adapt a process
Why joining BNP Paribas?

Leading banking institution
BNP Paribas is a leader in the Eurozone, and a prominent international banking institution with strong roots in Europe's banking history. It has a presence in 65 countries, with around 190 000 Employees Ã¢Â?including more than 145 000 in Europe.

Our presence in Portugal
Since 1985, BNP Paribas was one of the first foreign banks to operate in the country. Today, the Group has around 7.100 employees across several entities operating directly in the territory, offering a wide range of integrated financial solutions to support its clients and their businesses.

International reach
BNP Paribas Holds Key Positions In Its Three Core Operating Divisions

Thanks to its international presence and regular and close collaboration among its different entities, BNP Paribas has the resources to support all clients with financing, investment, savings and protection solutions that help make their projects a success.

Retail Banking, a division that brings together all of the GroupÃ¢ÂÂs retail activities and specialised business lines;
Investment & Protection Services that include specialised businesses offering a wide range of savings, investment and protection services;
Corporate & Institutional Banking division that offers tailored financial solutions for corporate and institutional clients.
Diversity and Inclusion commitment
BNP Paribas is an equal opportunity employer and proud to provide equal employment opportunity to all job seekers. We are actively committed to ensuring that no individual is discriminated against on the grounds of age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage or civil partnership status, pregnancy and maternity/paternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation. Equity and diversity are at the core of our recruitment policy because we believe that they foster creativity and efficiency, which in turn increase performance and productivity. We strive to reflect the society we live in, while keeping with the image of our clients.

Commitment towards work/life balance
At BNP Paribas we care about our employees wellbeing and promote a culture of good integration between work and rest. We believe our employees have rich personal lives outside of work, being fundamental to be disconnected from work to recharge both physically and mentally. Only through this balance we may all be at our best while working.

Remote Working Conditions
At BNP Paribas, we embrace a Smart Working framework based on trust, autonomy and collaboration. Within this framework, eligible employees can benefit from flexible remote working modalities adapted to our hybrid working environment. To guarantee a comfortable and efficient working set-up, eligible employees are provided with both the office and home equipment, are entitled to an equipment allowance and can benefit from exclusive partnerships to purchase additional equipment at reduced prices.

To find out more on why you should join BNP Paribas visit https://bnpp.lk/why-BNP-Paribas-Portugal

description:
The Search Group is a Risk and Research consultancy firm with a global footprint, and an enhanced presence in both Europe and East Asia. Our global clients rely upon us for due diligence, business intelligence, and specialist research products. We are also available to assist clients develop their ethics and governance programs - covering regulatory and financial crime compliance, ESG and business conduct. TSG is growing quickly hence is looking for motivated and committed people to join our local and global teams across all areas.

Job Summary

As Research Analyst you will be part of our Operations team and will report directly to the Regional Manager. You will be an individual contributor; however, you will also be working with our more Senior Research Analysts and Editors to help on projects and their professional development As a Research Analyst, you will conduct research on internet and web-based media databases, and write high-quality reports on companies and/or individuals using a combination of publicly-available and proprietary sources. In this role, you must ensure that the reports and daily updates meet the requirements in terms of content quality, accuracy, timeliness and completeness by establishing and monitoring adherence The Search GroupÃ¢ÂÂs leading standards.

Role And Responsibilities

Conduct research on internet or web-based media databases.

Produce high quality reports involving research and Analysis in different languages. For this position it is required that the candidate is fluent in English and Russian
Conduct first level quality control through peer review
Carry out watchlist database screening on the subjects of the Due Diligence checks
Provide input on the report writing process to help improve the quality and efficiency of the Research team
Engage with the Research team in other offices, seeking feedback, obtaining updates, managing delivery expectation on the quality of reports
Remain knowledgeable of regional and industry trends
Partner with other teams to ensure the integrity of key products
Demonstrate a hands-on approach to work and willing to participate in ad-hoc projects on short notice

Qualifications, Skills & Education Requirements

Tertiary level degree ideally in Law, Political Science, International Business, Accounting, Finance, Economics.
Minimum 2-3 years of due diligence, professional services engagements or in similar report generation.
Ability to oversee and support other research analysts and monitor work of less experienced colleagues.
Leadership and management skills to oversee and manage projects effectively.
Excellent Research skills across all media; significant understanding of risk areas and compliance related items and the ability to explain these to other research analysts.
Ability to handle ad hoc research into new areas and bespoke research.
Knowledge of the following Systems/IT: Office products, internet searches, social media.
Timeliness: deliver reports on time and consistently.
Dedication and commitment to continual learning.
Client focused approach.
Highest levels of integrity and displays this regularly.
This is a WFH position based on the country where it is advertised.

Please submit your CV or Resume in English.

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialised in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing.

Our purpose?

Every day we boost our clientsÃ¢Â?data transformation into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations.

Our strength?

Our data services stand on a double expertise: the combination of Artificial Intelligence and the business prowess acquired from our customers around the world, such as AccorHotels, Orange, Carrefour, Engie, Samsung, L'OrÃÂ©al, Nissan...

ArtefactÃ¢ÂÂs success comes from a unique mix of company assets: cutting-edge data technologies, agile methodologies for fast delivery, cohesive teams assembling the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital marketing experts.

Artefact is looking for a Data Analyst Specialist for our clients, in order to reinforce our multiple data marketing offers.

Artefact Is

13 offices in Paris, London, Shanghai, Dubai...
900 employees
4 practices: Data Consulting, Data Marketing, Activation and Creation
What you will be doing: Key responsibilities

As a Data Analyst Specialist, Your Role Will Encompass

Creating and implementing a tagging plan, using analytics tools according to the template and basic configuration
Performing audit reports and creating web analysis studies (client journey, landing page, channels ROI) by defining and monitoring different KPIs and PIs

description:
About The Job

This is a great opportunity to join a dynamic and pivotal project in General Insurance as a Tester in the UAT team with a leading Insurance company in South Dublin. This is a temporary 9 month contract with an immediate start. You'll be working in a team for a key strategic project in General Insurance. The project is key to this organisation's digital strategy for Commercial Lines business.

You can expect to work on a range of different product types and with various teams and business areas within G.I and with external third party suppliers. Working with colleagues in both the business and in more technical teams to test requirements and to ensure systems are suitable for end users.

This is an excellent opportunity to learn new skills and expand your experience in a broad, vibrant and dynamic area.

What will you be doing?

Act as Test Analyst on key change initiatives ensuring compliance to test processes and quality standards.
Analyse business requirements and design tests to ensure that business requirements are met.
Contribute to definition of test approach.
Design test suites with comprehensive coverage.
Design and management of test data.
Produce detailed, accurate estimates.
Test execution to agreed service standards.
Defect investigation, resolution and management.
Providing detailed reports using Microsoft Excel.
Skills & Experience

3rd level degree (IT related)
At least 3 years experience in a test role.
Experience in a general insurance role would be beneficial.
Strong attention to detail is a must.
Analytical, technical knowledge and test design skills.
Excellent Excel skills essential. VBA scripting beneficial.
Experience of different testing techniques and tools
Experience in testing insurance documentation.
Experience of the software development project lifecycle.
Experience of JIRA and Zephyr desirable.
ISTQB foundation in software testing.
Exposure to Polaris productwriter software.
What will you get for this role?

A competitive market leading salary depending on skills, experience, and qualifications
Generous pension (employee contribution matching of up to 14% if you contribute 8%)
Annual performance related bonus and pay review.
Holiday allowance of 25 days plus bank holidays, and the option to buy/sell up to 5 additional days.
No weekend or evening shift.
Free car parking.
Generous Health & dental insurance contributions after six months.
Matching Share Plan and Save As You Earn scheme and Approved Profit Share Scheme.
Cycle to Work benefit scheme.
TaxSaver Travel Scheme.
Family friendly parent's (matching paternity and maternity leave) and carer's leave.
Up to 40% discount for some Insurance products plus discounts for Friends and Family.
Employee Assistance Programme.
Volunteering days.
Professional qualification support and transparent career progression plans.
A Company For Everyone

Their diversity and inclusion policies and initiatives are shaping an environment where everyone feels welcome regardless of age, disability, race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, religion, culture, sexual orientation, national origin, marital status, pregnancy, maternity or those with other caring responsibilities. Their approach helps to ensure that their organisation is a place which values difference and provides equal opportunities for all.

They flex locations, hours and working patterns to suit their customers, business, and you.

Their smart working combines the benefits of flexibility with time together with colleagues.

Job description

Are you a data analyst?And do you have an affinity with public health and infection?Then read on!

What do we offer you

Reward in Gemeente scale 9 step 4
Temporary employment with a view of fixed
Working for the municipality of The Hague
Working on Westeinde 128
32 to 36 hours of working who are you

You have a customer and result-oriented approach, where you work in a planned and organizational way.With a large dose of convincing, advisory skills you take the team, colleagues and customers with you in the results of your analyzes.Not only the talent to analyze data and translate it into useful information is essential, but also the disposal of excellent communication skills to convey the information.Colleagues characterize you as an accurate, flexible employee who has an eye for the people around them.The work requires a proactive attitude and a great deal of accuracy.

At least 2 years of demonstrable relevant work experience, preferably in public health and infectious diseases in particular;
Experience in managing and checking data from various administrative processes;
Stimulate experience with improving processes and stimulating data -driven work;
Experience with guiding and translating the information needs;
Experience with data analysis and visualization;
Advanced knowledge of powerbi;
Knowledge of HPZONE;
Command of the Dutch and English language in word and writing;What are you going to do

You will work within the General Infection Fighting department, but you also work with colleagues from other departments and the municipality of The Hague.The department uses various systems, containing a multitude of available data.You get to work with this data and you know how to convert this and present it into understandable language.This requires insight, sharp analytical skills and extensive experience.Translate the data into dashboards and reports based on the needs of the department you have picked up.They serve as input for surveillance and monitoring and are supportive for policy, financial and process management within the department.

You are also an important adviser in the field of internal administrative and general work processes with the aim of further optimizing these processes.Where necessary, you work closely with our software suppliers, but also with other cooperating organizations.In addition, you are responsible for optimum use of BI tools (including user support).It is up to you to bring working in a higher level to a datage work within the department.In short: you help our organization to operate even better and more efficiently!

Where are you going to work

You will collaborate with substantive experts, such as doctors and nurses.In addition, you have a lot of contact with your colleague data analyst and epidemiologists within the department and IT specialists from the municipality of The Hague.It is a team that is in full development.There is an open corporate culture, where people like to find the connection with each other.

Application

Can you fully agree with this vacancy?Then apply quickly!Please note: we will not handle your application without a motivation letter.

This vacancy is of course open to anyone who recognizes themselves in this.

Application procedure

You apply via Tempo-Team, nice!To complete your application, you can easily create an account the first time.You can easily log in via your 'my tempo team' account and apply even easier next time.In addition, you will find the progress of your application (s) and your personal information in your account.So the way to find the most suitable job!

What You Will Bring

We are looking for someone that has:

a good understanding and knowledge about the "laws of physics" in information technology, including an understanding of what is possible to accomplish in computer networks and systems, given different prerequisites.
experience with analysis of executable files and documents such as: PE files and/or JavaScript, Flash, Silverlight, PDF, Office documents, ELF and APK files.
experience with analysis of network traffic.
experience with or interest in technologies / software such as Snort, Suricata, Bro IDS (or other technologies for inspection and analysis of network traffic).
experience with or interest in technologies such as Yara (or other static malware analysis solutions).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with technologies such as Cuckoo, Joebox, Norman MAG, BlueCoat / Symantec MAA, FireEye AX, or experience with / interest in sandbox technologies. experience with / interest in / desire to work with software such as Volatility, Rekall (or memory analysis in general).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with software such as FTK, Encase, Sleuthkit, Log2timeline, Plaso (or traditional forensics in general).
experience with / interest in / desire to work with solutions such as Soltra, MISP or other platforms for information and data sharing. Relevant certifications

SANS Security certifications: SEC487, SEC503, SEC504, SEC505, SEC506, SEC511, SEC560, SEC599.
SANS Forensics certifications: FOR500, FOR508, FOR526, FOR572, FOR578, FOR610.

What We Can Offer

An informal and pleasant working environment that provides opportunities for growth, influence and variations in tasks
Competitive salary, share program and bonus scheme that promotes a long-term employment outlook, including attractive pension and insurance coverage
Opportunities for relevant professional training (courses) and conferences
We place a strong emphasis on workplace well-being and teambuilding through social activities, events and trips with colleagues. In addition, we have an inclusive environment that promotes work-life balance and accommodates to families. Both in Utrecht and Oslo our offices are centrally located. In Oslo, you'll find us at Solli plass.
A workplace that has been ranked as one of the best in Europe for a number of years. In Norway we have been amongst the top 10 workplaces for 10 years in a row. Last year, we even won our category!

How do I apply?

Email us at rekruttering-web@mnemonic.io and write "MSS-TI-Analyst" in the subject field. Add a text about why you are right for the job, and your CV. Send us a code project you have been working on, that illustrates exactly how you work with code.

The Energy Data Analyst position supports the client interface with Kinect Energy, through multiple data platforms. Key responsibilities include data entry, processing and scanning of vendor invoices, data review and trend analysis. This position coordinates the communication and resolution of invoice discrepancies between the client, vendors, and Kinect Energy colleagues. This position requires ownership of various assigned supplemental activities that support the controls and processes needed for successful fulfillment of client requirements. You will be working in a fast paced, dynamic team-oriented environment.

Ensure daily completion of all data entry processing of vendor invoices and usage data into Kinect Energy systems

Communicate in a professional manner with verbal and written communications with all levels of employees, vendors, and clients
Coordinate with World Fuel Services personnel, suppliers, pipeline, and utilities to remedy errors discovered in a professional and timely manner
Quantify and report value to the Client Scorecard as incidents are remedied
An understanding of the energy contracts and complex energy invoices must be understood and analyzed
Requirements

Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal are essential
Strong analytical skills are essential
Strong IT skills are essential in windows-based application software such as Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint
Experience of processing high volume of data in an educational or work environment is essential
Knowledge and/or experience in the energy industry is desirable
Strong problem-solving, mathematical, and organizational skills are essential
Strong team working skills are essential
BachelorÃ¢ÂÂs degree is desirable

description:
About Us

Global Tech MarketsÃ¢Â?mission is to help organizations grow, evolve, and thrive. By integrating modern technology with the best people, we drive businesses forward in sustainable and smart ways. We do this by offering a range of specialist services, from which our partners can pick and choose depending on their needs.

Our range of expert services have been crafted to help businesses modernize and thrive at any point in their journey. Whether theyÃ¢ÂÂre just starting out and need a hand, or have a huge project in the pipeline, weÃ¢ÂÂre here to guide them and do the heavy lifting where needed. Our range of services includes support, sales, VIP, CRM, Payments, Payouts, Anti-fraud, Risk Management, and more.

Our values center on providing our assistance in a friendly and human fashion, cutting out the corporate tape to deliver a practical and holistic service. We build trust, and value long-term partnerships that allow our customers, and our team to grow together.

As a member of the Payments Department, you will be responsible for creating periodic analysis and valuable insight into the performance of our Payment Providers. You will need to work collaboratively with the Payment Relationship Managers and Head of Payments to deliver analysis of partner performance, costs and KPIÃ¢ÂÂs. Having a keen eye for detail and the ability to understand complex processing models is crucial for success in this role.

Your Responsibilities:

Data Analysis: responsible for analyzing, and interpreting, payment data to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in payment behavior. This will involve working with data sets, running analyses, and creating visualizations to present findings.
Reporting: preparing and presenting reports on payment data to the relevant stakeholders in the organization. This will include summarizing findings, providing insights, and making recommendations for improving payment processes.
Process Improvement: work closely with the Payments Team to identify areas for process improvement. This will involve analyzing current processes, identifying inefficiencies, and recommending changes to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of payment processing.
User Flow Analysis: analyze the user flow of the payment process to identify weak points and areas for improvement. This will involve examining the user journey, from a payment process perspective from start to finish and identifying any issues related to payment providers, product issues, or traffic issues.

Your Profile:

description:
Bedrijfsomschrijving

Je bent onderdeel van het team Informatievoorziening en Automatisering (I&A) van de afdeling FinanciÃÂ«n & Bedrijfsvoering. Dit team bestaat uit 6 collegaÃ¢ÂÂs waarvan er 2 werkzaam zijn als BI Specialist. Binnen dit team werk je samen aan projecten. Daarnaast heb je ook ieder je eigen verantwoordelijkheden.

Functieomschrijving

Als business intelligence specialist ben je verantwoordelijk voor het organisatie brede informatiebeheer en de informatievoorziening. Je bent gericht op het beheer en de kwaliteitsbewaking van het datamodel, het verzamelen van gegevens en het omzetten ervan in informatie. Je hebt een controlerende taak als het gaat om de kwaliteit van de gegevens.

De organisatie oriÃÂ«nteert zich op de implementatie van een nieuw ERP systeem. Het gebruik van verschillende data moet hiervoor opnieuw worden ingericht en dashboards moeten opnieuw worden gebouwd (Power BI). Jouw expertise is hierbij zeer welkom. Jij denkt mee over de te gebruiken data. Wat kunnen we nog meer met onze data doen? Welke behoefte is er? Welke data hebben we precies nodig en hoe zorgen we ervoor dat deze bruikbaar is? Het doel: de data op een goede manier gebruiken en daarmee stappen zetten naar een nog meer data gedreven organisatie.

Jouw Taken

Je draagt zorg voor de actualiteit van de documentatie voor het datamodel, gegevensdefinities, gegevensbeheer en rapportages en ontwikkelt documentatie, procedures en werkvoorschriften in lijn met de BISL methodiek
Je zorgt voor het implementeren van BI-projecten, onder andere op het gebied van ETL, DWH en data integratie
Je volgt wet- en regelgeving die betrekking hebben op de data
Je vertaalt wensen uit de organisatie naar geschikte BI oplossingen
Je zorgt voor het verder ontwikkelen, inrichten en onderhouden van de ETL-procedures en DWH-omgevingen
Je onderhoudt de ontwikkelde BI-producten
Je stelt procedures op voor het opschonen en verbeteren van data en focust hierbij op architectuur en datamodellen in bronsystemen en het datawarehouse
Je bouwt standaardrapportages en genereert managementinformatie
Je stelt het controleprotocol op en beheert deze
Je ondersteunt bij de aanschaf en/of vervaardiging van gebruikersdocumentatie en zorgt voor het actueel houden van de documentatie voor het datamodel, gegevensdefinities, gegevensbeheer en rapportages
Functie-eisen

HBO(+) werk- en denkniveau
inzicht in en ervaring met het verbeteren van I&A.
ervaring met het geven van uitwerking en implementatie van optimalisaties op het gebied van informatie- en datamanagement;
kennis van en ervaring met ETL, DWH en data integratie;
kennis van en ervaring met Microsoft SQL, SSIS, Visual studio en Power BI;
Ervaring met Dynamics Empire (pre)

Jouw salaris ligt tussen Ã¢Â?.755 en Ã¢Â?.361 bruto per maand.
